__e: But, ah, do not tell him what sorrows are in my heart!
Then one day, in the throes of the worst hangover of my life,
Your people's suffering is not my doing.
There's nothing to be gained from your pains, except more pain.
We have seen more suffering than any man should ever see and if there is going to be an end to it, it must be an end that justifies the cost.
I don't know what you think you know, but my marriage has survived more suffering than someone like you could ever grasp.
The pain and the sacrifice she had to go through in order to have the gift to create life.
You have wandered far in the world and met many hardships - all in vain.
There is so much suffering and injustice, so many tears in this country.
